item.title: Meta - Production Engineer Interview Experience
item.description: In this post, Iâ€™ll share my experience interviewing for the Production Engineer role at Meta. Production Engineering at Meta is similar to the Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) role at other companies. My journey included preparation, multiple screening rounds, and the onsite interview process. Screening Interviews: Link to heading Coding Screen: Link to heading My interview process began in October with the coding screen. For preparation, I relied heavily on LeetCode, specifically on problems tagged for “Meta.
